products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.
